CustomField.formula: IF( OR( BillingCountry = "Germany", BillingCountry = "Austria", BillingCountry = "Denmark", BillingCountry = "Netherlands" ), "Region 1", IF( OR( BillingCountry = "France", BillingCountry = "Switzerland", BillingCountry = "Belgium" ), "Region 2", IF( OR( BillingCountry = "United States", BillingCountry = "Canada" ), 'Region 3', IF( OR( BillingCountry = "Spain" ), "Region 4", IF( OR( BillingCountry = "United Kingdom" ), "Region 5", IF( OR( BillingCountry = "Czech Republic" ), "Region 8", Region_Phone__c))))))
CustomField.label: Region
